Articles.Content:
I\'m tring to download some ships but whenever I try to download an attachment it just gives me this index.php file. Help me please?

Thanks
What browser do you use? It should ask you to save the file.
Using Firefox 8.0. It asks me if I want to save index.php

Try right-clicking the link and chose Save Link As... it should allow you to save as a .craft file.

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

Okay, I have confirmed this is a bug with Firefox 8 and SMF.

http://www.simplemachines.org/community/index.php?topic=454734.0

Solution, use IE or other browser.

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

Crap.

Now i can\'t even see the attacjments with ie.

Gonna downgrade firefox
I would recommend staying away from IE unless you have a HAZMAT suit; on a more serious note, have you tried Google Chrome? I\'ve been using it for quite a while now, and it\'s been excellent so far.

I only suggested the Internet Exploder because I knew it would be installed on the system.

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

Internet Exploder

Yes! Not the only one who says this!

Okay, I have confirmed this is a bug with Firefox 8 and SMF.

http://www.simplemachines.org/community/index.php?topic=454734.0

Solution, use IE or other browser.

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

But I cant even Download the ships and parts
